name: Shedding Velvet
description:
A short little game made for Narrative Driven Game Jam #6 2022

You are lost in the woods. You do not know of anyone who has ever left these woods. You will try to survive.

Written by Me 

https://twitter.com/Sir_witch

Background and CG art by Alannah Journeay

https://twitter.com/WodaroArt

https://alannahjourneay.com/
